title: Cassiopeia's win rate has been slowly rising
body: She's sitting at a 49% winrate according to Lolking. I think Deathfire Touch synergizes very well with her, it gives her a little extra-damage she so much needed in the early and mid game. If she gets relevant play, will riot nerf her again?

replies.body:
An AP and non-ADC champ that's getting better?! Preposterous!

Such insolence shall be hit by the divine nerf hammer of Morello

Bring these arrogant mages to their knees

playing cass requires the player to be very good at kiting attack move w.e and majority of players didn't understand how to use her E to refund mana though it's basically like using Q on annie as long as the minnions poisoned. the people on the forums here actually wanted cass to stack her passive from killing minnions as well, if you can imagine a 500 stack cass in 20 minutes lol I told them though that when marksman update comes her win rate increase much more, because more people will understand her mechanically{{champion:69}}
